#summary install JAP_REMOTE_NODE

=Install JAP_REMOTE_NODE=

==Pre-installation==
  * [INSTALL_NODE install NODE >= 0.8.0]

==Installation==
  * unzip JAP_REMOTE_NODE-X.X.X.zip
  * open JAP_REMOTE_NODE-X.X.X
  * [CONFIGURE_JAP configure JAP_REMOTE_NODE.json.js]
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER.TYPE (type of REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER, "HTTP" or "HTTPS")
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER.ADDRESS
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER.PORT
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER.AUTHENTICATION`[`X`]`.USERNAME
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER.AUTHENTICATION`[`X`]`.PASSWORD
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER.CERTIFICATE.KEY.FILE (CK.pem of REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER if type of REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER is "HTTPS")
    * REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER.CERTIFICATE.FILE (C.pem of REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER if type of REMOTE_PROXY_SERVER is "HTTPS")
  * execute JAP_REMOTE_NODE.bat
